TopicTitle: Is there a mod that allows planes to cruise at a certain altitude?

Articles.Content:
Title says it all.

It would benefit me not having to keep my eyes on the altimeter incase the plane runs out of oxygen.

Theres Mechjeb, which offers an altitude and heading hold feature, not sure how it works.

Supposedly Persistant Rotation can offer a simpler if less intuitive option for this.

And then of course theres a couple autopilot mods out there, not sure if any of them work though.

I got sick of manually flying planes for hours on end, Atmosphere Autopilot works well and although the UI is a bit of a mess it's flexible and you can set it to keep a constant altitude while you continue to steer.
It isn't a conventional plane but the Heisenburg airship pack holds altitude through buoyancy.
